verses.verse: Then the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came<WH1961> to Jeremiah<WH3414> the second<WH8145> time,<WH8145> while he was still<WH5750> confined<WH6113> in the court<WH2691> of the guard,<WH4307> saying,<WH559>
"Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> who made<WH6213> [the earth,] the Lord<WH3068> who formed<WH3335> it to establish<WH3559> it, the Lord<WH3068> is His name,<WH8034>
'Call<WH7121> to Me, and I will answer<WH6030> you, and I will tell<WH5046> you great<WH1419> and mighty<WH1219> things,<WH1219> which you do not know.<WH3045>'

"For thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> concerning<WH5921> the houses<WH1004> of this<WH384> city,<WH5892> and concerning<WH5921> the houses<WH1004> of the kings<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> which are broken<WH5422> down<WH5422> [to make a defense] against<WH413> the siege<WH5550> mounds<WH5550> and against<WH413> the sword,<WH2719>

'While [they] are coming<WH935> to fight<WH3898> with the Chaldeans,<WH3778> and to fill<WH4390> them with the corpses<WH6297> of men<WH120> whom<WH834> I have slain<WH5221> in My anger<WH639> and in My wrath,<WH2534> and I have hidden<WH5641> My face<WH6440> from this<WH384> city<WH5892> because<WH5921> of all<WH3605> their wickedness: <WH9567>
'Behold,<WH2009> I will bring<WH5927> to it health<WH724> and healing,<WH4832> and I will heal<WH7495> them; and I will reveal<WH1540> to them an abundance<WH6283> of peace<WH7965> and truth.<WH571>
'And I will restore<WH7725> the fortunes<WH7622> of Judah<WH3063> and the fortunes<WH7622> of Israel,<WH3478> and I will rebuild<WH1129> them as they were at first.<WH7223>

'And I will cleanse<WH2891> them from all<WH3605> their iniquity<WH5771> by which<WH834> they have sinned<WH2398> against Me, and I will pardon<WH5545> all<WH3605> their iniquities<WH5771> by which<WH834> they have sinned<WH2398> against Me, and by which<WH834> they have transgressed<WH6586> against Me.

'And it shall be to Me a name<WH8034> of joy,<WH8342> praise,<WH8416> and glory<WH8597> before all<WH3605> the nations<WH1471> of the earth,<WH776> which<WH834> shall hear<WH8085> of all<WH3605> the good<WH9186> that I do<WH6213> for them, and they shall fear<WH6342> and tremble<WH7264> because<WH5921> of all<WH3605> the good<WH9186> and all<WH3605> the peace<WH7965> that I make<WH6213> for it.'

"Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord,<WH3068> 'Yet<WH5750> again<WH5750> there shall be heard<WH8085> in this<WH2088> place,<WH4725> of which<WH834> you say,<WH559> "It is a waste,<WH2720> without<WH369> man<WH120> and without<WH369> beast,<WH929> "[that is,] in the cities<WH5892> of Judah<WH3063> and in the streets<WH2351> of Jerusalem<WH3389> that are desolate,<WH8074> without<WH369> man<WH120> and without<WH369> inhabitant<WH3427> and without<WH369> beast,<WH929>

the voice<WH6963> of joy<WH8342> and the voice<WH6963> of gladness,<WH8057> the voice<WH6963> of the bridegroom<WH2860> and the voice<WH6963> of the bride,<WH3618> the voice<WH6963> of those who say,<WH559> "Give<WH3034> thanks<WH3034> to the Lord<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> For the Lord<WH3068> is good,<WH2896> For His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting<WH5769>"; [and of those] who bring<WH935> a thank<WH8426> offering<WH8426> into the house<WH1004> of the Lord.<WH3068> For I will restore<WH7725> the fortunes<WH7622> of the land<WH776> as they were at first,<WH7223> 'says<WH559> the Lord.<WH3068>

"Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> 'There shall again<WH5750> be in this<WH2088> place<WH4725> which is waste,<WH2720> without<WH4480> <WH369> man<WH120> or beast,<WH929> and in all<WH3605> its cities,<WH5892> a habitation<WH5116> of shepherds<WH7462> who rest<WH7257> their flocks.<WH6629>

'In the cities<WH5892> of the hill<WH2022> country,<WH2022> in the cities<WH5892> of the lowland,<WH8219> in the cities<WH5892> of the Negev,<WH5045> in the land<WH776> of Benjamin,<WH1144> in the environs<WH5439> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> and in the cities<WH5892> of Judah,<WH3063> the flocks<WH6629> shall again<WH5750> pass<WH5674> under<WH5921> the hands<WH3027> of the one who numbers<WH4487> them,' says<WH559> the Lord.<WH3068>

'Behold,<WH2009> days<WH3117> are coming,<WH935>' declares<WH5002> the Lord,<WH3068> 'when I will fulfill<WH6965> the good<WH2896> word<WH1697> which<WH834> I have spoken<WH1696> concerning<WH413> the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> and the house<WH1004> of Judah.<WH3063>

'In those<WH1992> days<WH3117> and at that time<WH6256> I will cause a righteous<WH6666> Branch<WH6780> of David<WH1732> to spring<WH6779> forth;<WH6779> and He shall execute<WH6213> justice<WH4941> and righteousness<WH6666> on the earth.<WH776>

'In those<WH1992> days<WH3117> Judah<WH3063> shall be saved,<WH3467> and Jerusalem<WH3389> shall dwell<WH7931> in safety;<WH983> and this<WH2088> is [the name] by which<WH834> she shall be called:<WH7121> the Lord<WH3068> is our righteousness.<WH6664>'
"For thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord,<WH3068> 'David<WH1732> shall never<WH3808> lack<WH3772> a man<WH376> to sit<WH3427> on the throne<WH3678> of the house<WH1004> of Israel;<WH3478>

and the Levitical<WH3881> priests<WH3548> shall never<WH3808> lack<WH3772> a man<WH376> before<WH4480> <WH6440> Me to offer<WH5927> burnt<WH5930> offerings,<WH5930> to burn<WH6999> grain offerings,<WH4503> and to prepare<WH6213> sacrifices<WH2077> continually.<WH3605> <WH3117>' "
And the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came<WH1961> to Jeremiah,<WH3414> saying,<WH559>

"Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord,<WH3068> 'If<WH518> you can break<WH6565> My covenant<WH1285> for the day,<WH3117> and My covenant<WH1285> for the night,<WH3915> so that day<WH3119> and night<WH3915> will not be at their appointed<WH6256> time,<WH6256>

then My covenant<WH1285> may also<WH1571> be broken<WH6565> with David<WH1732> My servant<WH5650> that he shall not have<WH1961> a son<WH1121> to reign<WH4427> on his throne,<WH3678> and with the Levitical<WH3881> priests,<WH3548> My ministers.<WH8334>

'As the host<WH6635> of heaven<WH8064> cannot<WH3808> be counted,<WH5608> and the sand<WH2344> of the sea<WH3220> cannot<WH3808> be measured,<WH4058> so<WH3651> I will multiply<WH7235> the descendants<WH2233> of David<WH1732> My servant<WH5650> and the Levites<WH3881> who minister<WH8334> to Me.' "
And the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came<WH1961> to Jeremiah,<WH3414> saying,<WH559>

"Have you not observed<WH7200> what<WH4100> this<WH2088> people<WH5971> have spoken,<WH1696> saying,<WH559> 'The two<WH8147> families<WH4940> which<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> chose,<WH977> He has rejected<WH3988> them'? Thus they despise<WH5006> My people,<WH5971> no<WH4480> longer<WH5750> are they as a nation<WH1471> in their sight.<WH6440>

"Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord,<WH3068> 'If<WH518> My covenant<WH1285> [for] day<WH3119> and night<WH3915> [stand] not, [and] the fixed<WH2708> patterns<WH2708> of heaven<WH8064> and earth<WH776> I have not established,<WH7760>

then<WH1571> I would reject<WH3988> the descendants<WH2233> of Jacob<WH3290> and David<WH1732> My servant,<WH5650> not taking<WH3947> from his descendants<WH2233> rulers<WH4910> over<WH413> the descendants<WH2233> of Abraham,<WH85> Isaac,<WH3327> and Jacob.<WH3290> But I will restore<WH7725> their fortunes<WH7622> and will have<WH7355> mercy<WH7355> on them.' "
